section.name: name
section.description: hgpt - an HCLI for interacting with ChatGPT

section.name: description
section.description: The "hgpt" HCLI allows you to converse with ChatGPT 3.5 via command line. You can send content as an input stream, and the AI model will generate a response based on it.\n\nThe HCLI relies on the use of a OpenAI generated API key exported as an environment variable (i.e. export OPENAI_API_KEY='secret')

section.name: examples
section.description:
echo 'hello, how are you?' | hgpt chat

(echo 'inspect this cli.py file'; cat cli.py) | hgpt chat

hgpt clear

hgpt chat dump

hgpt context dump

command.name: chat

command.name: clear
command.description: The "clear" command clears the ongoing chat history so that you can start a fresh conversation.
